purpose: Facilitates semantic understanding for AI agents and MCP clients, enabling more effective data analysis and business intelligence operations
principle: Builds on semantic layer technology to provide a unified interface for data querying and analysis, leveraging SQL and MCP
reusability: Designed for integration with MCP clients; offers APIs for semantic data processing and analysis
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for non-MCP environments, and potential stability issues
